title: Bubbalous Bodacious BBQ
description: A responsive and modern website for Orlando's favorite BBQ restaurant. Built with React + Vite, and modern web technologies, featuring a complete menu system, party pack ordering, and online ordering capabilities. Includes comprehensive restaurant information, contact details, and legal pages with mobile-first responsive design.

title: Kingdom Movement
description: A modern, sleek and responsive CrossFit Studio website. Features nutrition menus, dynamic class schedules, membership tiers, and other community content. Includes mobile-first responsive design with CSS Grid and Flexbox, and JSON-based data management. Built for Kingdom Movement to showcase their fitness community and brand identity.

title: Moonstar Esthetics
description: A modern, responsive website for Moonstar Esthetics â€” a professional esthetician studio offering facial treatments, laser/IPL, body care, and waxing services. Built with React and styled for elegance, accessibility, and performance. Designed to reflect confidence, care, and clarity.

title: Reelix
description: A sleek, responsive Movie and TV show discovery app built with React and Vite, featuring dynamic data from the TMDB API. It offers seamless client-side routing with React Router, a dark-themed desktop-first design, optimized API handling, and regional auto-language support for an immersive user experience.
